reviewText: bought this for my mother for christmas.  thought i was buying a cd but it is a movie dvd. guess i should have read the full description. Anyways, my mothe rstill enjoys it.

After watching over 100 Gaither videos plus seeing them in concert, I still enjoy great gospel music.  With so many of those singers I enjoyed in my youth now singing in Heaven, I'm glad to still be able to watch and hear them still today.
It is a wonderful music and glorious in His presence. I recommend this for every one who wants peaceful time.
This is a terrific video!  It has lots of new material, as it promises.  It's a blessing to see that Bill Gaither is keeping these wonderful artists in the forefront.
As with all the dvd / cd's I have purchased from Bill and Gloria Gaither. I highly recommend this for all.

We are big Gaither Fans and am so excited about being able to get the videos from Amozon. The singing is great, the service from Amozon is awesome, and the price is very reasonable, what more could you ask for?

I have almost all of the Gaither Homecoming Videos, so when I found out that this one had all the great singers that have gone home but was never released before, I had to buy it.  And I am glad I did because I really enjoyed it.

I have loved Gospel Music all of my 80 years. Gaither Homecoming Celebration, is one of the best Bill Gaither has ever produced. Most of the Greats are home now, but their Music, love of the Lord and their joy is on every moment of this DVD.  You will love it!!
Received in good shape
This is a good quality, used DVD.  It arrived promptly, and I am extremely satisfied with it.
One of their best presentations.
Always great
Thank you
I am so sad, because the DVD came broken, need to know what to do.  Thanks
Love this so much.  I have shared it with friends and they loved it!
Love the Gaithers.  This one had a lot of the older participants which I really enjoy.
Arrived on time and as described.
SUPER DVD
this was given as a gift and she loved it!
Got it for Christmas for my father. He loved it.
This video is a little dated but it fit my needs perfectly.  I was looking for a video and song of The King Is Coming and you won't find one better than this!
just what I ordered at a great price and on time.
excelente

Gospel music at it's best featuring artists from the past and present. If you like this type of worship and praise music, you will certainly like this one performed at the Charlotte Coliseum in 1998. The songs as well as the artists are very good and bring back wonderful memories for me.
Met my expectations!

This is some video footage that Bill Gaither found in his vault, that he had never aired. It is from 1998 - 1999. Filmed in Charlotte, N.C.
Some incredible piano playing by Anthony Burger. Features the Martins, The Goodmans, Jake Hess, Jessy Dixon, the Gaither Vocal Band, and others. The GVB consists of Bill, Guy Penrod, David Phelps, and Mark Lowry. Several moments of Mark Lowry comedy.
A remarkable duet by Candy Christmas and David Phelps. When they ended it all by singing "The King Is Coming," I knew I had to watch this one over and over. I loved it.
Great Item - Love It - Would recommend highly.

Well, this is a bit different. It is lively, starts out with some uplifting music from the GVD. Some really good stuff from the late Anthony Burger; what a gift he was, (and still is, thanks to Brother Bill.)  I just love those old singers, and appreciate so much being able to hear them still. Jake Hess, Bob Cain, The Happy Goodmans, and Jesse Dixon, all gone from this world, still sing for us on this DVD of previously recorded music. The GVD sing several times (3+; this is several isn't it?).

I could do nothing less than to recommend this DVD.

When you need a pick me up these are the DVD's to turn to. It doesn't take long before you are singing and clapping and having a great time. They really lift your Spirits when you have those down times.

this is a great DVD..as only Bill Gaither can produce..I have most of his dvds..I started when they were VHS tapes..
love everything Bill and Gloria come out with..highly recommend..
Wonderful vocal band. Inspiring songs. I listen to these songs again and again. My wife loves the songs as well.
She loves the video, and watches them over and over. It was a pleasure to ad to her collection's of the Gaither's.

This was purchased for a nursing home where a family member lives.  I do not know what happened to the dvd, but I hope they did get to watch it & I hope they enjoyed it. It seemed to have grown legs and walked off.
It was given as a gift to a person that is a fan of the Gaither's -  I believe they were happy with receiving the recording
I LOVED THE GAITHER MUSIC.  I LOVED GOSPEL MUSIC OF ANY KIND. WQHEN I HEAR  ONE OF THJE DAVD ISA OUT I GOES A BUY IT
We love this DVD from the archives. So many of the artists have gone on to be with the Lord. It is a treasure. I wanted one with Carmen. Now we hear he may soon be going home as well.
I love all the Gaither videos. This was a gift, and she couldn't stop raving about it. It's a winner.
Got this for my mom, she has a collection.  She loves the Gaithers,  Amazon has all the new and many of the older ones. Handy and easy to order.
Bought for my mom and dad. They have several and watch them all the time!! Good entertainment for any age.

It is a real blessing and joy to have this DVD and listen to beautiful singing that must surely be a blessing to young and old.  It is a treasure that we will view on numerous occasions in the days to come, i am sure, and will be the same for everyone who listen to it. Magnificent!
This is truly a great DVD of the Gaithers, the singing is outstanding, bring back a lot of old memories

This dvd was great as are all of the Gaithers dvds or videos. Bill is a perfectionist and you can tell by the music he produces. I highly recommend anyone who likes Southern Gospel music to buy this dvd. It is just one of the Gaither's dvds that are priceless. Once you buy it and listen to it; you will not want to part with it and it is reasonably priced.
I am never disappointed with any Gaither product. I wanted to have a DVD that had all the oldtimers that I've cometo love,
It is good, but for one with the entire collection of Homecoming CD's and DVD's this did not have anything new to wrtite home about.
She really loves this group and I bought this for her so she could watch it anytime she wanted.  She said that she really enjoyed this dvd.
Some of the singers in this video have gone on.  Actually that is what it is about.  Which makes it one of my favorites and it is so enjoyable.
Ich bin sehr zufrieden! Mit dieser Musik geht mir das Herz auf. Gerne bestelle ich irgendwann wieder. Liebe Gre aus Deutschland.
Gift for my parents and they loved it! You can't go wrong with the Gaithers. They watch it over and over.
I love the Gaither's music.  The music was poor quality and comedy pathetic.  I did not watch very long.  I was highly disappointed.
Love this musc.
really enjoy the Gaithers.
Nice music!
Problem with it.
I am disappointed with this product it has a lot of talking and few songs not like advertised on tv
Husband loves it
This was a gift to my parents and they loved it!
